review: I was a bit nervous after looking at the reports related to endometriotic cyst and pcos, but after talking to her I felt a lot of comfort. She understood the problem and provided options to chose from based on my age. She explained me the root cause of the cyst in detail. Thank you so much. I would strongly recommend her to everyone and I would be under her guidance for rest of my life.

review: Experience was good .She is friendly and I must recommend her she is a good doctor . I'm satisfied with my treatment.

She spoke very roughly at times and just flat out laughed when I said that I researched and saw that multiple known carcinogens  were found in pads that were tested at an independent lab. She barely took the time to look at my breasts as well. All in all I did not feel that she treated my main concerns seriously.
reply_text: If you are more comfortable with diagnosis by Google knowledge and treatment done in USA, please don't waste your time visiting a qualified doctor. Thank you for saving my time for those who actually need my advice for their treatment.

review:
There are perepheral issues....

We reached in time but we're made to wait as visit was on First come basis. So what is appointment for..???

Then, Shoes had yo be removed. 

The place to sit is very congested n veey small.

Professional Consultancy part I will get to know after medicine is taken for few days......
But discussion part with Doctor was decent n she was genuinely gentle. 

Peripheral issues need to be addressed.  Thanks.

review: She was very polite, understood my problem and was super patient with understanding what can be the problem and how to overcome that. My husband is super awkward with anyone who cannot speak in English and Dr. Halder very understanding and she spoke in English. We feel very comfortable to go back to her. I will definitely go back to her and recommend her to others who need gynaecological treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: All these years, I never consulted any Gynecologist cause I had no such issues before… Recently, I was facing some issues with irregular periods and I came Accross Arunima through Practo… I was very tensed about my periods and after the consultation she gave me just 1 medicine tablet and surprisingly I got my periods and Thankfully Am not facing any further irregularities.. So, I am so grateful that I found such amazing and frienly doctor like never before.. I do recommend her ❤️

review:
Dear [Doctor Arunima Halder],

I wanted to share a quick note about my recent appointment with Dr.Arunima Halder . I am very pleased with the care and attention I received during my visit. Your expertise and professionalism were evident, and you made me feel comfortable throughout the appointment.

The doctor was very kind and explained well. Usually I'm very nervous to see a doctor, especially a gynec. Dr. Arunima was very friendly and I felt comfortable explaining my issues. I saw her for a UTI and vaginal itching. She prescribed me meds based on the tests taken.

This is the first time Inhave visited Dr. Arunima Halder for my wife.
Her way of explaining the medical issues and the treatment for the same was exceptional. She was extremely professional and friendly in dealing with us.

I would recommend her for any gynaecological treatment at a very affordable cost and the best part is the behaviour and time given to the patients.
Thank you Practo for giving us the find of the Doctor and a heartfelt thanks to Dr. Halder.

Dr.Arunima Ma'am is a very caring person. She is a good woman as a doctor. She listened to the patients for a long time. I feel very relaxed talking to her. I have benefited a lot from getting Arunima Ma'am in my pregnancy period.  She gave me a lot of courage during the pregnancy period. That is why I have become so brave in this time.
Thanking you.
